DOC.brief_title: Norwegian Psychomotor Physiotherapy - The Effect Quality Life
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim project intend evaluate effect Norwegian psychomotor physiotherapy ( NPMP ) Health relate Quality Life measure Short-form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) . The secondary aim evaluate effect Norwegian psychomotor physiotherapy ( NPMP ) variables Subjective Health Complaints Inventory ( SHC ) ; Hopkins 's Symptom Check List , Ã–rebro Screening musculo-skeletal pain , Numeric Pain Rating Scale , Oslo Social Support Scale , Coping The self-esteem scale '' The study design base guideline randomize controlled trial present CONSORT statement . The study address people NPMP treatment approach , ask consider effect treatment give , measure separate registration quality life , pain , physical , mental social functioning . Participants Power calculation base primary outcome Short-form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) prove minimum 170 participant must recruit . The participant recruit among patient wait list NPMP psychomotor physiotherapists member Norwegian Physiotherapists Association . If patient want participate study , randomize intervention group control group draw lot . The intervention group NPMP usual 6 month . The control group remain wait list 6 month . Participants group ask fill self-assessment questionnaire start project completion project six month . Participants intervention group receive form 12 month , examine whether subsequent change completion NPMF . Timing survey : Participants give questionnaire NPMP physiotherapist - Baseline - 2 week NPMF ( group ) - After 6 month ( group ) - After 12 month ( intervention group ) .
